title: Wizard of Nowhere
overview: How would you feel if you were dropped off at a place where you have never even dreamed of being before? The magical story begins at a strange land. The six men are given no money and they are at a place where no one recognizes them as celebrities. Without any help, they have to return home within 72 hours. The beauty of Nepal and the people with bright smiles provide a fairy tale like atmosphere. Will they make it back home?
